00237         double top = mOSampleRate;
00238         VS_ASSERT(top, "should never be zero");
00239         double bot = mISampleRate;
00240         VS_ASSERT(bot, "should never be zero");

00243       }
00244       if (conversionRatio <= 0)
00245         throw std::invalid_argument("programmer error");
00246 
00247       // FFMPEG's re-sample function doesn't let you specify the size of your
00248       // output buffer, but does use up all the space you might expect
00249       // plus 16-bytes as a lead-in/lead-out for it to seed the resampler.
00250       // Hence, the hard-coded 16 here.
00251       // NOTE: 16 might change IF the value of filters in the audio_resample
00252       // method in libavcodec/resample.c changes.
00253 #define VS_FFMPEG_AUDIO_RESAMPLER_LEADIN 16
00254       retval = 
00255           (int32_t)((numSamples * conversionRatio)+VS_FFMPEG_AUDIO_RESAMPLER_LEADIN+0.5);
00256     }
00257     catch (std::invalid_argument & e)
00258     {

00260       retval = -1;
00261     }
